EmailTemplate.name: TPTO Request Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: PTO request has been approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!TPTO_PTO_Request__c.OwnerFullName}, Your PTO request has been approved by {!TPTO_PTO_Request__c.BA__c}.
Kindly delegate your daily work responsibilities to your peer to ensure the deliverable's are not affected. Regards,
Trialforce
